item.description: TEST ONLY; INC#Edit; 07:25AM; TEST ONLY; Margaret Stewart
TEST II; INC#0320; 06:42AM; TEST ONLY; Margaret Stewart

Physical Rescue; INC#1656; 09:35PM; 6846 N Van Nuys Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3t1yVB1; Van Nuys; A traffic collision resulted in multiple trapped patients. Firefights used hydraulic rescue tools to free them from the wreckage. Two have been transported to the hospital in moderate-to-serious condition. One declined transport on scene. LAPD Inc #4575. Nothing further.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E239 E289 E81 E90 EM14 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 T39 T89 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1442; 07:07PM; 10805 W Wentworth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ajj9br; #HansenDam; LAFD responded to a two-vehicle head-on collision, with three victims trapped. Sadly, one was found dead inside the wreckage. Firefighters used hydraulic rescue tools (Holmatro) to extricate the other two patients for rapid transport to the hospital in critical condition, and assisted LAPD/Coroner with recovering the third. Nothing further.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E24 E274 E298 E77 E98 EM11 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA60 RA77 RA89 RA91 RA98 T74 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire - Now Contained; INC#1070; 03:32PM; 5332 E Ithaca Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lRRSSt; #ElSereno; Approximately one-quarter-acre of brush on fire that threatened one home. It took 51 firefighters approximately 25 minutes to contain the threat, with only one out building sustaining any damage. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 BP47 CM22 E1 E12 E16 E202 E212 E25 E290 E44 E47 E90 EM1 H2 H4 H5 HA2 HA4 HA5 RA47 RH114 T12 T90; CH5; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Grass Fire; INC#1088; 03:19PM; 4260 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wQV9rC; Studio City; LAFD confirms 28 firefighters achieved extinguishment of the fire at 1616 hrs. No injuries or structure damage reported. CHP and DOT will remain on scene until it is safe for civilians to drive through affected area. ; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E108 E278 E6 E60 E86 T78; CH8; 17; Jennifer Middleton

Rubbish Fire; INC#1088; 03:19PM; 4260 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wQV9rC; Studio City; At the intersection of Vineland and the Hollywood FY, callers report seeing smoke in the grassy area behind fire station 86. LAFD confirms slow moving 50 x 50 ft small grass fire burning. DOT and CHP assisting with traffic control in area. Small spot fires near the 170 FY are being controlled by units on scene, but are putting off smoke in the area. No damage to fire station 86 or any other structures.; FS 86; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E108 E278 E6 E60 E86 T78; CH8; 17; Jennifer Middleton

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1026; 04:02PM; 1313 N Vista St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GCWrKh; Hollywood; Full extinguishment of the blaze was achieved by the 44 firefighters on scene at approximately 1511 hrs. No injuries to civilians or LAFD personnel. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E61 RA27 RA61 T27 T61; CH7; 14; Jennifer Middleton

Structure Fire; INC#1026; 02:47PM; 1321 N Vista St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MXxOdp; Hollywood; LAFD units arrived on scene to find a detached garage behind a one-story single-family dwelling with smoke showing from the garage. Garage fire impinging a tree and additional auto in rear of garage. Units are working aggressively to extinguish flames. No reports of injuries or additional structures being exposed by the blaze.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC18 BC5 E227 E261 E27 E41 E61 RA27 RA61 T27 T61; CH9; 14; Jennifer Middleton

Multi-Patient Traffic; INC#1287; 04:50PM; 6520 N Louise Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Gk123z; #LakeBalboa; Firefighters responded to a two-vehicle traffic collision, resulting in the assessment and care of 5 adult patients. Two patients in good condition declined hospital transport. Three patients were transported to a local hospital in moderate condition. LAPD Inc #3776. Nothing further. ; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 E100 E290 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA100 RA73 RA83 RA872 T90; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
